entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:39 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 07:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: SSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this morning with risk of freezing rain. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
